item.description:
Note that this particular game only has 6 official players (suspects), but the RSVP limit is set to 8 because there are 2 "extra" players that are not actual suspects.  If you would like to observe and not play a part, then please feel free to join in, but mention that in your comment so that I can adjust the RSVP limit accordingly.  You're also welcome to do a Pop In to just enjoy the "show".  Keep in mind that no acting skills or abilities are needed, just a desire to enjoy the game.

 

From boardgamegeek.com:

The mystery: Welcome to Vegas with it's glitzy casinos and show-stopping entertainment. The deck is stacked against wealthy casino owner, Blackjack White, as he bursts into the love-me chapel to stop his beautiful naive daughter from marrying a burly biker named Ezekiel Z. Ryder. Alas, Blackjack is shot dead by a member of the wedding party. Don't bet on the guilty suspect...it may be you...

Includes party planner, character booklets for all suspects including their roles and background information, 8 place cards, 8 party invitations & envelopes, 6 secret clues, and cassette tape with an introduction, summary of events, and the solution to the crime.
item.how_to_find_us: Will send out my number the day before for those that don't have it, will be in the lobby (ticket sales lobby, not concession stand lobby) at least 30 minutes before the movie starts.
item.name: Game Night: Eat, Drink and Be Married (Murder Mystery)
